body:
At least gohan has super saiyan genes, plus, 18'll have a (reasonably) normal looking kid instead of a freaking toriyama joke character design from his early dragon ball (vanilla) / "dr.slump" days.
Even if it inherits the stale, boring, dime a dozen, typical black hair/eyes combo, it could still transform, not sure since the only 1/4 saiyan character is pan and they seem to be allergic to the idea of having her transform into super saiyan, perhaps it's not possible due to too little saiyan blood in her for that or it skips a generation, who knows, toriyama probably forgot by now (and I know about the goku & vegeta clone descendants from that special epilogue episode of GT, not cannon, japs still to this day design offspring/descending characters as a mini clone of their main cast parents/ancestors, but better and more powerful too, fire emblem, naruto, bleach, etc it's a shonen show rule they can't get over), either way, it'll look better then kurilin's kid, that's for sure.
Look like pan going to have a older sibling.
This series need to be translated asap
